author: tianzhi
content: Nice list! Thank you. There is one more thing you missed, which IMO is essential for JS development: ESLint for VSCode

replyList.author: yang
replyList.content: These were some of the VSCode extensions that I use regularly. What other extensions and themes do you like? Respond to this article and mention them.
